title: BACKYARD / STONE PERC
description: First follow-up convo with Kim where you discover keys under the stone. Difficult perception finds the stone.

dialogueTree.title: Stone: "A stone like any other, lying in a..."
dialogueTree.english: A stone like any other, lying in a whorl of sleet and mud. Maybe there's something under it?
dialogueTree.polish: Kamień jak każdy inny. Leży na kupie śniegu i błota. Może coś pod nim jest?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Камень як любы іншы. Ляжыць на кучы снегу і гразі. Можа, нешта пад ім ёсць?

links.title: Stone: "There's a key beneath it, rusty fro..."
links.english: There's a key beneath it, rusty from the dirt.
links.polish: Pod spodem leży zardzewiały od błota klucz.
links.belarusian: Пад нізам ляжыць заржавелы ад гразі ключ.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This must be for the front door. P..."
links.english: "This must be for the front door. Pity it doesn't have the apartment number on it. This building has hundreds of apartments."
links.polish: „To musi być klucz do drzwi wejściowych. Szkoda, że nie ma na nim numeru mieszkania. W tym budynku są setki apartamentów”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта павінен быць ключ ад уваходных дзвярэй. Шкада, што на ім няма нумара кватэры. У гэтым будынку сотні кватэр".

links.title: You: ""How are we going to find the right..."
links.english: "How are we going to find the right one?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We'll just have to go in and see.""
links.english: "We'll just have to go in and see."
links.polish: „Będziemy musieli wejść do środka i się przekonać”.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This must be for the front door. L..."
links.english: "This must be for the front door. Let's see if it works."
links.polish: „To musi być klucz do drzwi wejściowych. Sprawdźmy, czy zadziała”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта, напэўна, ключ ад ўваходных дзвярэй. Давайце праверым, ці спрацуе".

links.title: Logic: "Looks like it could belong to the b..."
links.english: Looks like it could belong to the building's front door.
links.polish: Zdaje się, że może otwierać drzwi wejściowe budynku.
links.belarusian: Здаецца, што можа адкрываць ўваходныя дзверы будынка.
